attributes.description: This dashboard provides expanded alerts overview for Azure cloud
attributes.title: [Filebeat Azure] Alerts Overview
Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "input_control_vis", "title": "Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [], "params": {"pinFilters": false, "useTimeFilter": false, "updateFiltersOnChange": true, "controls": [{"fieldName": "azure.subscription_id", "id": "1571250866125", "type": "list", "options": {"multiselect": true, "size": 5, "order": "desc", "dynamicOptions": true, "type": "terms"}, "parent": "", "indexPatternRefName": "control_0_index_pattern", "label": "Subscription ID"}]}}

attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metrics", "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [], "params": {"filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and event.category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "isModelInvalid": false, "type": "timeseries", "interval": "", "axis_formatter": "number", "time_field": "", "show_legend": 0, "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "axis_scale": "normal", "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "show_grid": 1, "series": [{"fill": 0.5, "chart_type": "line", "filter": {"query": "event.outcome: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "formatter": "number", "axis_position": "right", "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "type": "count"}], "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "split_mode": "filter", "separate_axis": 0, "point_size": 1, "line_width": 1, "hide_in_legend": 0}, {"fill": 0.5, "chart_type": "line", "filter": {"query": "event.outcome: \"Resolved\" or event.outcome: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "formatter": "number", "axis_position": "right", "color": "#68BC00", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "type": "count"}], "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "split_mode": "filter", "separate_axis": 0, "point_size": 1, "line_width": 1, "hide_in_legend": 0}], "axis_position": "left"}}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metric", "title": "Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [{"schema": "metric", "type": "count", "enabled": true, "id": "1", "params": {"customLabel": "Alerts"}}, {"schema": "group", "type": "filters", "enabled": true, "id": "2", "params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Activated"}, {"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Resolved\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Resolved"}, {"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Succeeded"}]}}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "metric": {"useRanges": false, "style": {"fontSize": 60, "bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "labelColor": false, "subText": ""}, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "percentageMode": false, "colorsRange": [{"to": 10000, "from": 0, "type": "range"}], "metricColorMode": "None", "labels": {"show": true}, "invertColors": false}, "type": "metric", "addLegend": false, "dimensions": {"metrics": [{"accessor": 1, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "number"}, "type": "vis_dimension"}], "bucket": {"accessor": 0, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "string"}, "type": "vis_dimension"}}}}

attributes.title: Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "heatmap", "title": "Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]", "aggs": [{"schema": "metric", "type": "count", "enabled": true, "id": "1", "params": {}}, {"schema": "segment", "type": "terms", "enabled": true, "id": "2", "params": {"field": "azure.resource.provider", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc", "missingBucket": false, "customLabel": "Provider", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "otherBucketLabel": "Other"}}, {"schema": "group", "type": "terms", "enabled": true, "id": "3", "params": {"field": "azure.resource.group", "orderBy": "1", "size": 5, "order": "desc", "missingBucket": false, "customLabel": "Resource Group", "otherBucket": false, "missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "otherBucketLabel": "Other"}}], "params": {"colorsNumber": 4, "colorSchema": "Greens", "legendPosition": "right", "dimensions": {"y": [{"accessor": 1, "aggType": "count", "format": {"id": "number"}, "params": {}}], "x": {"accessor": 0, "aggType": "terms", "format": {"params": {"missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "id": "string"}, "id": "terms"}, "params": {}}}, "addTooltip": true, "times": [], "type": "heatmap", "addLegend": true, "valueAxes": [{"labels": {"color": "black", "overwriteColor": false, "show": false, "rotate": 0}, "show": false, "scale": {"defaultYExtents": false, "type": "linear"}, "id": "ValueAxis-1", "type": "value"}], "enableHover": false, "colorsRange": [], "percentageMode": false, "setColorRange": false, "invertColors": false}}
